Package curam.util.client.view

Contains the View architecture of the Client Infrastructure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentRenderer<C extends Component>
    A renderer plug-in interface for components of all types.
    RendererContext
    The renderer context allows a renderer to access context information that may be necessary when rendering data.
    RendererContract
    Defines the contract between renderers when one renderer re-uses another.
    Style
    A plug-in container that allows renderer plug-ins to be specified to control the style of the presentation of components on a page.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComponentRenderer
    An abstract superclass for all non-domain-specific component renderer plug-ins.

Package curam.util.client.view Description

Contains the View architecture of the Client Infrastructure.
